mapper.select: select label_id, name, color,999 as orderNum from wk_work_task_label

select a.task_id,a.name,a.stop_time,a.priority,a.work_id,a.status,a.label_id, d.customer_ids,d.contacts_ids,d.business_ids,d.contract_ids, (select count(*) from wk_work_task_comment where type_id = a.task_id and type = 1) as comment_count, (select count(*) from wk_work_task where pid = a.task_id) as child_all_count, (select count(*) from wk_work_task where pid = a.task_id and status = 5) as child_WC_count from wk_work_task as a left join wk_work_task_relation as d on a.task_id = d.task_id where pid = 0 and find_in_set(#{labelId},a.label_id) and a.ishidden = 0
and (a.main_user_id = #{userId} or a.owner_user_id like concat('%,',#{userId},',%'))

select distinct a.work_id,a.name,a.color from wk_work as a left join wk_work_task as b on a.work_id = b.work_id where find_in_set(#{labelId},b.label_id) and b.ishidden = 0
and (b.main_user_id = #{userId} or b.owner_user_id like concat('%,',#{userId},',%'))
group by a.work_id
